about.details:
Incorporated in 2014, Indore based Soni Soya Products Limited is engaged in the business of processing and trading of organic and non- genetically modified organisms (non-GMO) agricultural products such as Soya, Maize ( Corn), Wheat, Flax seeds and Mustard, Oil, Rice, Pulses, Herbs, Spices, and other grains.

The Company is registered with U.S. Food and Drug Administration pursuant to the Federal Food Drug Cosmetic Act and the FDA Food Safety Modernization Act. Soni Soya is also registered with Agricultural and Processed Food Products Export Development Authority of Government of India (APEDA) to export such scheduled products as per APEDA Act, 1985.

The Company is equipped with an in-house testing laboratory to test the products. Its customer base is spread across the globe with presence in countries like Canada, Dubai, South Korea, Sri Lanka, United States of America. The majority of sales revenues are through direct exports which contributed to 97.71%, 82.05% and 67.84% for March 31, 2015, 2016, and 2017 respectively.

The company has 24 employees on its payroll.

faqs.question: What is the Soni Soya IPO?
faqs.answer:
Soni Soya IPO is a SME IPO of 1800000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹4.50 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹25 per share. The minimum order quantity is 6000.

The IPO opens on March 28, 2018, and closes on April 4, 2018.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Soni Soya IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Soni Soya IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Soni Soya IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Soni Soya IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Soni Soya IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Soni Soya IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Soni Soya IPO opens on March 28, 2018 and closes on April 4, 2018.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Soni Soya IPO?
faqs.answer: Soni Soya IPO lot size is 6000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,50,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Soni Soya IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Soni Soya IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Soni Soya IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Soni Soya IPO will be done on Monday, April 9, 2018, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, April 11, 2018. Check the Soni Soya IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Soni Soya IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Soni Soya IPO listing date is on Thursday, April 12, 2018.
